GSD.description:
hamradio: defer ax25 kfree after unregister_netdev

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.10.89 by commit 450121075a6a6f1d50f97225d3396315309d61a1. For more details please see the references link.
